scripts.deploy: shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/management && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/management/.next && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/management/config && shx cp -r config/* ../../../publish/web/management/config && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/management/node_modules && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/management/.next/static && shx cp -r .next/standalone/node_modules/* ../../../publish/web/management/node_modules && shx cp -r .next/static/* ../../../publish/web/management/.next/static    && shx cp -r .next/standalone/packages/management/.next/* ../../../publish/web/management/.next &&  shx cp -f server.prod.js ../../../publish/web/management/server.js
